my_draw_ellipse

PURPOSE

DRAW_ELLIPSE(x, c, outline_color, fill_color)

SYNOPSIS

function h = draw_ellipse(x, rotation,eigenvals, outline_color, fill_color)

DESCRIPTION 

 DRAW_ELLIPSE(x, c, outline_color, fill_color)
   Draws ellipses at centers x with covariance matrix c.
   x is a matrix of columns.  c is a positive definite matrix.
   outline_color and fill_color are optional.

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:
  • show_ellipses_on_image

SOURCE CODE 

0001 
0002 function h = draw_ellipse(x, rotation,eigenvals, outline_color, fill_color)
0003 % DRAW_ELLIPSE(x, c, outline_color, fill_color)
0004 %   Draws ellipses at centers x with covariance matrix c.
0005 %   x is a matrix of columns.  c is a positive definite matrix.
0006 %   outline_color and fill_color are optional.
0007 
0008 n = 20;                    % resolution
0009 radians = [0:(2*pi)/(n-1):2*pi];
0010 unitC = [sin(radians); cos(radians)];
0011 
0012 if ~exist('outline_color'),
0013     outline_color = 'g';
0014 end
0015 coord_x = unitC(1,:)*eigenvals(1);
0016 coord_y = unitC(2,:)*eigenvals(2);
0017 h = [];
0018 
0019 y(1,:) = rotation(1,1)*coord_x + rotation(1,2)*coord_y + x(1);
0020 y(2,:) = rotation(2,1)*coord_x + rotation(2,2)*coord_y + x(2);
0021 if 1==1,
0022     h  =plot(y(1,:),y(2,:),outline_color);
0023     set(h,'linewidth',2)
0024 else
0025     %y = r*unitC + repmat(x(:, i), 1, n);
0026     if nargin < 4
0027         h = [h line(y(1,:), y(2,:), 'Color', outline_color)];
0028     else
0029         h = [h fill(y(1,:), y(2,:), fill_color, 'EdgeColor', outline_color)];
0030     end
0031 end
